meanings.definition: Silly or ridiculous in a playful or amusing way.
meanings.sent1: The goofiest clown made everyone laugh at the circus.
meanings.sent2: She wore the goofiest hat to the party.
meanings.sent3: The goofiest puppy chased its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: His goofiest dance moves entertained the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The goofiest cartoon character always brought joy to children.

meanings.definition: Acting in a foolish or clumsy manner.
meanings.sent1: He made the goofiest mistake by wearing mismatched socks.
meanings.sent2: The goofiest student tripped over his own shoelaces.
meanings.sent3: In the goofiest way possible, she spilled juice all over herself.
meanings.sent4: The goofiest waiter dropped a tray of dishes with a loud crash.
meanings.sent5: His goofiest attempt at juggling ended in a mess of flying balls.
